body_html:
@tangshuran It is similar to the issue #5874, tf.global_variables_initializer() is the new API for TF, and initialize_all_variables probably to be deprecated soon. So I think it is better to keep the new API.

By the way, if you would like to use the new API, you can install tensorflow via nightly binary.
body_text:
@tangshuran It is similar to the issue #5874, tf.global_variables_initializer() is the new API for TF, and initialize_all_variables probably to be deprecated soon. So I think it is better to keep the new API.
By the way, if you would like to use the new API, you can install tensorflow via nightly binary.
body:
@tangshuran It is similar to the issue #5874, `tf.global_variables_initializer()` is the new API for TF, and `initialize_all_variables` probably to be deprecated soon. So I think it is better to keep the new API. 

By the way, if you would like to use the new API, you can install tensorflow via nightly binary.
